itemListElement.name: Vegan Nachos with Nut-free Nacho Cheese

@graph.name: Vegan Nachos with Nut-free Nacho Cheese
@graph.description: These Nachos come together in 30 minutes. Make the nut-free Nacho cheese sauce in 10 mins,spice up beans, prepare the toppings, layer and serve.
recipeIngredient: 15 oz can black beans (drained and rinsed ot 1.5 cups cooked black or pinto beans)
2 Tbsp chickpea flour  (or other flour like unbleached white)
1/4 tsp garlic powder or paste  (or 1 small clove)
1 Tbsp pickled jalapeno  (or 1 tsp fresh jalapeno)
Spiced Black Beans (Recipe Above or Refried Pinto Beans)
pico de gallo or any chunky salsa
guacamole  (or mashed avocado mixed with lime juice and salt)
fresh or pickled jalapeno slices (cilantro and hot sauce (optional))

itemListElement.text: Heat oil in a skillet at medium heat. Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Add the rest of the ingredients, cover and cook for 10 minutes. Mash some of the beans. Taste and adjust salt and spice.
itemListElement.name: Heat oil in a skillet at medium heat. Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Add the rest of the ingredients, cover and cook for 10 minutes. Mash some of the beans. Taste and adjust salt and spice.

itemListElement.text: Blend everything in a blender until smooth. Pour into skillet at medium heat. Keep stirring and cook for 5 to 6 minutes so the flour gets cooked through. The mixture will thicken to smooth sauce.
itemListElement.name: Blend everything in a blender until smooth. Pour into skillet at medium heat. Keep stirring and cook for 5 to 6 minutes so the flour gets cooked through. The mixture will thicken to smooth sauce.

itemListElement.text: Carefully taste. Add more salt or spice(chipotle pepper), or lemon juice or vinegar for sour. Use immediately on Nachos.
itemListElement.name: Carefully taste. Add more salt or spice(chipotle pepper), or lemon juice or vinegar for sour. Use immediately on Nachos.

itemListElement.text: Warm the tortilla chips in the oven for 5 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Warm the tortilla chips in the oven for 5 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Layer the chips, beans, nacho cheese sauce, salsa/pico de gallo, another layer of chips, cheese sauce, salsa, then guacamole or mashed avocado, fresh or pickled jalapeno and serve. Add a drizzle of vegan sour cream (optional).
itemListElement.name: Layer the chips, beans, nacho cheese sauce, salsa/pico de gallo, another layer of chips, cheese sauce, salsa, then guacamole or mashed avocado, fresh or pickled jalapeno and serve. Add a drizzle of vegan sour cream (optional).
